tarvent_create_audience_group.description: Creates an audience group in the selected audience.

props.name: isPublic
props.description: Select whether the group is public or not. Public groups are shown in forms with the groups question.

tarvent_create_contact_note.description: Adds a note to a contact.

props.name: note
props.description: Enter the note you would like to add to the contact.

tarvent_create_contact.description: This action is used to create or update a contact in an audience.

props.name: email
props.description: Enter the contacts email. NOTE: If the audience uses a custom contact identifier and overwrite is enabled, then this will update the FIRST contact that matches the email.

props.name: updateAction
props.description: Update the contact\

props.name: groupAction
props.description: Select whether to replace or only add to contact groups. NOTE: Add only will only add the contact to the groups they are not already in. Replace will remove the contact from all existing groups and add them to the selected groups.

props.name: tagAction
props.description: Select whether to replace or only add to contact tags of an existing contact. NOTE: Add only will only add the tags the contact does not already have. Replace will replace all contact tags with the entered tags.

props.name: firstName
props.description: The contacts first name.

props.name: lastName
props.description: The contacts last name.

tarvent_create_suppression_filter.description: Creates a suppression filter in your account to suppress a contact.

props.name: email
props.description: Enter the email to add to the suppression list.

props.name: reason
props.description: Use the description to describe why this contact is being suppressed.

tarvent_create_transaction.description: Sends a transactional email. NOTE: This will use your email API credits.

props.name: fromEmail
props.description: Enter who this transaction is from.

props.name: fromName
props.description: Enter a friendly name for who this transaction is from.

props.name: toEmail
props.description: Enter the email that the transaction should be sent to.

props.name: ccEmail
props.description: Enter emails that this transaction should be CC\

props.name: bccEmail
props.description: Enter emails that this transaction should be BCC\

props.name: subject
props.description: Enter a subject line for the transaction.

props.name: replyToEmail
props.description: Enter the email that the replies should go to.

props.name: replyToName
props.description: Enter a friendly name the replies should go to.

props.name: variables
props.description: NOTE: Variable names (first column) can have Letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens. Any other characters in the first column only will be removed.

props.name: mimeType
props.description: If "Template" is specified, this will be ignored..

props.name: content
props.description: To merge in variables, you must use the syntax [[Tx.VariableData.VariableName]] (ex. Variable name is FirstName, merge syntax would be [[Tx.VariableData.FirstName]]) If "Template" is specified, this will be ignored.

props.name: ignoreSuppressCheck
props.description: Select if the suppression filters on your account should be ignored for this transaction.

tarvent_generate_custom_event.description: Generate a custom event in your Tarvent account.

tarvent_get_audience_groups.description: Finds an audience group by name.

props.name: name
props.description: Find an audience by searching using its name.

tarvent_get_audiences.description: Finds an audience by name or tags.

props.name: name
props.description: Find an audience by searching using its name.

props.name: tags
props.description: Find an audience by searching using its tags. To search using multiple tags, separate the tags with a comma.

tarvent_get_campaigns.description: Finds a campaign by name, status or tags.

props.name: name
props.description: Find a campaign by searching using its name.

props.name: tags
props.description: Find a campaign by searching using its tags. To search using multiple tags, separate the tags with a comma.

tarvent_get_contact.description: Finds a contact by your custom key data field (typically this is by email).

props.name: email
props.description: Search for a contact by email. If the audience uses a custom contact identifier, then the search returns the FIRST contact that matches the email address. To target a specific contact, please use the contact\

tarvent_get_custom_event.description: Finds a custom event by name.

props.name: name
props.description: Find a custom event by searching using its name.

tarvent_get_journey.description: Finds a journey by name, status or tags.

props.name: name
props.description: Find a journey by searching using its name.

props.name: tags
props.description: Find a journey by searching using its tags. To search using multiple tags, separate the tags with a comma.

tarvent_send_campaign.description: Sends a copy of a campaign.

tarvent_update_contact_group.description: Adds or removes a contact from an audience group.

props.name: action
props.description: Select whether to add or remove the contact from the group.

tarvent_update_contact_journey.displayName: Add/Remove A Contact From A Journey
tarvent_update_contact_journey.description: Adds or removes the contact from a journey.

props.name: action
props.description: Select whether to add or remove the contact from the journey.

tarvent_update_contact_status.description: Subscribes or unsubscribe a contact in an audience.

props.name: action
props.description: Select whether to subscribe or unsubscribe the contact.

tarvent_update_contact_tag.description: Adds or removes a tag from contact.

props.name: action
props.description: Select whether to add or remove tags.

props.name: action
props.description: Select whether to start or stop the journey.

tarvent_campaign_send_finished.description: Triggers when a campaign has been sent to a contact. WARNING: This will fire for every contact the campaign is sent to, please be careful using this trigger.

tarvent_contact_added.description: Triggers when a contact is added to the selected audience.

tarvent_contact_bounced.description: Triggers when a campaign or transactional email bounces (is rejected) for a contact.

props.name: type
props.description: Select which bounce type should fire the trigger.

tarvent_contact_clicked.description: Triggers when a link within a campaign or transactional email is clicked by a recipient.

props.name: campaignType
props.description: Select what campaign(s) should fire the trigger.

tarvent_contact_group_updated.displayName: Contact Added Or Removed From A Group
tarvent_contact_group_updated.description: Triggers when a contact is added or removed from a group.

props.name: action
props.description: Select if the trigger should fire when a contact is added or removed.

tarvent_contact_note_added.description: Triggers when a note is added to a contact.

tarvent_contact_opened.description: Triggers when a campaign or transactional email is opened by a recipient.

props.name: campaignType
props.description: Select what campaign(s) should fire the trigger.

props.name: status
props.displayName: Select what status should fire this trigger.
props.description: If not included, only the contact ID, email and unique identifier will be passed back.

tarvent_contact_tag_updated.description: Triggers when a tag is added or removed from a contact.

props.name: action
props.description: Select if the trigger should fire when a tag is added or removed.

tarvent_contact_unsubscribed.description: Triggers when a contact unsubscribes from an audience.

tarvent_form_submitted.description: Triggers when a known or unknown contact submits a sign up, profile update, or other form.

tarvent_page_performed.description: Triggers when a known or unknown contact performs a Call-To-Action within a landing page.

tarvent_survey_submitted.description: Triggers when a known or unknown contact submits a survey.

tarvent_transaction_created.description: Triggers when a transactional email is created for a known or unknown contact.

tarvent_transaction_sent.description: Triggers when a transactional email is processed and sent to one or more recipients.
